description:
net: add a LookupTXT function.

This CL only supports Unix, not Plan 9 or Windows.

messages.text:
On 13 September 2011 03:06, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> Please add a test.  It shouldn't run by default
> but look at TestGmailMX for an example.

I added a test to lookup_test.go. PTAL.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2302c9faa3ff ***

net: add a LookupTXT function.

This CL only supports Unix, not Plan 9 or Windows.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/4996048

Please add a test.  It shouldn't run by default
but look at TestGmailMX for an example.

I'd suggest looking for gmail.com's txt record
(host -t txt gmail.com).

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 4996048: net: add a LookupTXT function.
